alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Charlotte and north central Lee Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Babcock Ranch to 6 miles northwest of Olga to near East Dunbar. Movement was west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Babcock Ranch, East Dunbar, Pine Manor, Palmona Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Buckingham, McGregor, Villas, Whiskey Creek, Fort Myers Shores, Page Park, North Fort Myers, Page Field Airport, Suncoast Estates, Tice and Gateway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
